Source.Name: nomad
Source.Summary: Nomad is a simple and flexible workload orchestrator
Source.Description: Nomad is a simple and flexible workload orchestrator to deploy and manage containers (docker, podman), non-containerized applications (executable, Java), and virtual machines (qemu) across on-prem and clouds at scale.
